```{r, include = FALSE}
ckanr_setup(url = "http://iys.hakai.org")

pkgs <- package_list_current(as = "table")
pkgs <- pkgs %>% unnest(resources, name_repair = "universal")
names(pkgs)

subset <- pkgs %>% 
  select(title, num_resources, `metadata-point-of-contact`, description , url, notes)
```
